displayImages.caption:
Ambrym, Vanuatu
Adventurer Sam Cossman moves towards a huge lava lake wearing a custom-built heat suit. The Marum crater has one of only seven lava lakes on the planet. Cossman and his team used high-tech drones, virtual reality cameras and biometric wearable sensors to learn more about the geology of such an extreme environment Photograph: Sam Cossman/Barcroft Media
displayImages.altText:
Ambrym, Vanuatu
Adventurer Sam Cossman movies towards the huge lava lake wearing a custom built industrial proximity heat suit. harrowing journey into the Marum crater, which is one of only seven lava lakes on the planet. In 2014 the 33-year-old left his home in San Francisco to fulfil his dream as a digital storyteller and tech-explorer. Sam and his team used high tech drones, virtual reality cameras, and biometric wearable sensors to learn more about the geology of such an extreme environment.
displayImages.cleanCaption:

Adventurer Sam Cossman moves towards a huge lava lake wearing a custom-built heat suit. The Marum crater has one of only seven lava lakes on the planet.
